question_text: What are some challenges IT professionals face with supporting wired connectors in mixed-device environments? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of backward compatibility with USB-C
Different power output levels across ports
All Apple devices now only use USB-C
Proprietary cables for certain device brands
correct_answer: Different power output levels across ports
Proprietary cables for certain device brands
explanation: Despite USB-C adoption, many devices still use proprietary or older connectors, and power capabilities vary by port.
